item.title: [508] Equipment stats interface bug
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

The thing is when you click Equipment interface it removes all tabs just shows your inventory. But if you wield some item, removed tabs returns and glicthing out items, if you exit Equipment interface everything is ok.

What i need help with? if player enter this interface i wona make player not able to wear anything!

united.wmv - YouTube <- click for video (demo of glitch watch hats)

Code

if (buttonId == 55) { p.frames.showInterface(p, 667); p.frames.setInventory(p, 149); p.frames.setString(p, "0kg", 667, 38); p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64209, 93, p.items, p.itemsN); p.frames.setItems(p, -1, 64208, 94, p.equipment, p.equipmentN); p.setEquipmentBonus(); }

Read full topic
